document_data.name: Rex
document_data.mainbody: '''Rex''' was a [[saurial]] [[cleric]] who was separated from his kind by the evil god [[Moander]].
document_data.Description: The cleric had green scales, beige chest, white back spines, and dark red eyes. He wore a ''[[holy symbol]]'', and ''[[bracers of protection]] +2''. Rex carried a ''[[mace]] +2''.
document_data.History: Rex was a crown prince of his people, until he and several of his kind were taken by the evil god [[Moander]] and banished to [[Faer√ªn]]. He traveled to [[Myth Drannor]] in search of the ''[[Codex of the Planes]]'', a tome he hoped would return him and his people back to their homeworld.
